entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
